TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 通知資源管理員有關應用程式的預設文化特性。

span.span: Informs the resource manager of an app's default culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 桌面應用程式Desktop Apps 在桌面應用程式，屬性會通知應用程式的預設文化特性的資源管理員，並且其資源的位置。In desktop apps, the attribute informs the resource manager of an app's default culture and the location of its resources. 根據預設，資源會內嵌在主應用程式組件，而且您可以使用屬性，如下所示。By default, resources are embedded in the main app assembly, and you can use the attribute as follows. 這個陳述式會指定英文 （美國） 是應用程式的預設文化特性。This statement specifies that the English (United States) is the app's default culture. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/vb/example1.vb#1)] 您也可以使用屬性，以指示可以找到的預設文化特性的資源，藉由提供屬性陳述式中的列舉值。You can also use the attribute to indicate where can find the resources of the default culture by providing an enumeration value in the attribute statement. 這通常是為了表示資源存在於附屬組件。This is most commonly done to indicate that the resources reside in a satellite assembly. 例如，下列陳述式會指定英文 （美國） 是應用程式的預設或中性文化特性和其資源位於附屬組件。For example, the following statement specifies that English (United States) is the app's default or neutral culture and that its resources reside in a satellite assembly. 物件將會尋找它們在名為 EN-US 子目錄中。The object will look for them in a subdirectory named en-US. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/vb/example2.vb#2)] > [!TIP] > 我們建議一律使用屬性來定義您的應用程式的預設文化特性。We recommend that you always use the attribute to define the default culture of your app. 屬性會執行兩個角色：The attribute performs two roles: - 如果預設文化特性的資源會內嵌在應用程式的主要組件和必須擷取屬於文化特性的預設文化特性中，與相同資源會自動使用的資源，而是位於主要組件搜尋的附屬組件。If the default culture's resources are embedded in the app's main assembly and has to retrieve resources that belong to the same culture as the default culture, the automatically uses the resources located in the main assembly instead of searching for a satellite assembly. 這會略過一般組件探查，可改善查詢效能，您載入，而且可以減少您的工作集的第一個資源。This bypasses the usual assembly probe, improves lookup performance for the first resource you load, and can reduce your working set. 請參閱[封裝和部署資源](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)處理序用來探查資源檔。See [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md) for the process uses to probe for resource files. - 如果預設文化特性的資源位於附屬組件中，而不是主應用程式的組件，屬性會指定文化特性和執行階段可以從中載入資源的目錄。If the default culture's resources are located in a satellite assembly rather than in the main app assembly, the attribute specifies the culture and the directory from which the runtime can load the resources. ## [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式 Apps 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式載入及使用擷取其資源類別屬性定義發生失敗的探查時所使用之資源的中性文化特性。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps whose resources are loaded and retrieved by using the class, the attribute defines the neutral culture whose resources are used in the event of a failed probe. 它不會指定資源的位置。It does not specify the location of the resources. 根據預設，找不到預設文化特性的資源使用的應用程式封裝資源索引 (PRI) 檔。By default, uses the app's package resource index (PRI) file to locate the resources of the default culture. 中性文化特性所定義屬性加入至 UI 的語言清單中，以模擬這種效果的結尾。The neutral culture that is defined by the attribute is added to the end of the UI language list to simulate this effect. 如果載入資源擷取使用[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.ResourceLoader](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238182)類別或中的型別[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238194)命名空間，屬性會被忽略。If you load and retrieve resources by using the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.ResourceLoader](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238182) class or the types in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238194) namespace, the attribute is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會使用簡單的"Hello World"應用程式來說明使用屬性來定義預設值或後援文化特性。The following example uses a simple "Hello World" app to illustrate the use of the attribute to define a default or fallback culture. 它需要不同的資源檔案的建立英文 (en)、 英文 （美國） (EN-US)，以及法文 （法國） (FR-FR) 文化特性而有所不同。It requires the creation of separate resource files for the English (en), English (United States) (en-US), and French (France) (fr-FR) cultures. 以下顯示名為 ExampleResources.txt 英文的文化特性之文字檔的內容。The following shows the contents of a text file named ExampleResources.txt for the English culture. ``` # Resources for the default (en) culture. Greeting=Hello ``` 若要使用的應用程式中的資源檔，您必須使用轉換檔案從其文字 (.txt) 格式的二進位 (.resources) 格式，如下所示：To use the resource file in an app, you must use the to convert the file from its text (.txt) format to a binary (.resources) format as follows: ``` resgen ExampleResources.txt ``` 應用程式編譯時，才會在主應用程式組件中內嵌二進位資源檔。When the app is compiled, the binary resource file will be embedded in the main app assembly. 以下顯示名為提供的英文 （美國） 文化特性資源的 ExampleResources.en US.txt 文字檔的內容。The following shows the contents of a text file named ExampleResources.en-US.txt that provides resources for the English (United States) culture. ``` # Resources for the en-US culture. Greeting=Hi ``` 文字檔可以轉換成二進位資源檔，藉由在命令列，如下所示：The text file can be converted to a binary resources file by using the at the command line as follows: ``` resgen ExampleResources.en-US.txt ExampleResources.en-US.resources ``` 應該使用編譯的組件二進位資源檔，然後放在應用程式目錄的 EN-US 子目錄，發出下列命令：The binary resource file should then be compiled into an assembly by using and placed in the en-US subdirectory of the app directory by issuing the following command: ``` al /t:lib /embed:ExampleResources.en-US.resources /culture:en-US /out:en-us\Example.resources.dll ``` 以下顯示名為 提供法文 （法國） 文化特性資源的 ExampleResources.fr FR.txt 文字檔的內容。The following shows the contents of a text file named ExampleResources.fr-FR.txt that provides resources for the French (France) culture. ``` # Resources for the fr-FR culture. Greeting=Bonjour ``` 文字檔案可以在命令列中，如下所示使用 ResGen.exe 來轉換成二進位資源檔：The text file can be converted to a binary resource file by using ResGen.exe at the command line as follows: ``` resgen ExampleResources.fr-FR.txt ExampleResources.fr-FR.resources ``` 應該使用組件連結器編譯的組件的二進位資源檔，然後放 FR-FR 的子目錄中的應用程式目錄發出下列命令：The binary resources file should then be compiled into an assembly by using Assembly Linker and placed in the fr-FR subdirectory of the app directory by issuing the following command: ``` al /t:lib /embed:ExampleResources.fr-FR.resources /culture:fr-FR /out:fr-FR\Example.resources.dll ``` 下列範例提供可執行的程式碼，將目前文化特性，會提示輸入使用者的名稱，並顯示當地語系化的字串。The following example provides the executable code that sets the current culture, prompts for the user's name, and displays a localized string. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/vb/example.vb#1)] 它可以編譯的 Visual Basic 中使用下列命令：It can be compiled by using the following command in Visual Basic: ``` vbc Example.vb /resource:ExampleResources.resources ``` 或者，使用下列命令，在 C# 中：or by using the following command in C#: ``` csc Example.cs /resource:ExampleResources.resources ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string cultureName) cil managed

param.name: cultureName
param.span: 寫入目前組件的中性資源所用文化特性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the culture that the current assembly's neutral resources were written in.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文化特性名稱的詳細清單，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。For a detailed list of culture names, see [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string cultureName, valuetype System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation location) cil managed
Public Sub New (cultureName As String, location As UltimateResourceFallbackLocation)

param.name: cultureName
param.span: 寫入目前組件的中性資源所用文化特性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the culture that the current assembly's neutral resources were written in.

param.name: location
param.span: 一個列舉值，表示要從中擷取中性後援資源的位置。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the location from which to retrieve neutral fallback resources.

summary.span: 使用指定的最終資源後援位置，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified ultimate resource fallback location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用具有建構函式列舉來指定是否類別是從主應用程式組件 （預設值），或從所指定的附屬組件擷取中性後援資源和屬性。Use the constructor with the enumeration to specify whether the class is to retrieve neutral fallback resources from the main app assembly (the default), or from a satellite assembly specified by the and the properties. 文化特性名稱的詳細清單，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。For a detailed list of culture names, see [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CultureName As String
public: property System::String ^ CultureName { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: 主要組件的預設文化特性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the default culture for the main assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文化特性名稱的詳細清單，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。For a detailed list of culture names, see [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Location As UltimateResourceFallbackLocation

summary.span: 取得 類別要用來以[資源後援處理序](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)抓取中性資源的位置。

span.span: Gets the location for the class to use to retrieve neutral resources by using the [resource fallback process](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md).

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指示抓取中性資源之位置 (主要或附屬組件)。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the location (main assembly or satellite) from which to retrieve neutral resources.
